OmniScript.customHtmlTemplates:
<style>
.via-slds section.slds-page-header.vlc-slds-page--header::after{
background: #FF6E0D;
width: 60px;
height: 3px;
}
.via-slds span.slds-icon_container{
background: #FF6E0D;
}
.slds-backdrop.slds-backdrop--open{
    display: none !important;
}
.via-slds .vlc-slds-wizard::before{
display:none;
}
.via-slds .vlc-slds-right--panel::after{
background: #FF6E0D;
width: 60px;
height: 3px;
align: center;
}

.via-slds .list-group.vertical-steps .list-group-item.active:before {
   background-color: #0070D2;
   color: #fff;
}
.via-slds .list-group.vertical-steps .list-group-item.completed.active:before {
   background-color: #0070D2;
}
.via-slds .list-group.vertical-steps .list-group-item.completed:before {
   background-color: #0070D2;
   color: #fff;
}
.via-slds .list-group.vertical-steps .list-group-item.completed {
   border-left: 3px solid #0070D2;
}
.via-slds .vlc-slds-remote-action--button .vlc-control-wrapper .slds-box {
   background: #0070D2;
}

@media(min-width: 62.5em){
.via-slds .slds-page-header__title.vlc-slds-page-header__title[prev=false], .via-slds .slds-page-header__title.vlc-slds-page-header__title[prev=true] {

   padding-top: 25px;
}
}
.via-slds form[stepForm] { border-right: 1px solid #e7ecf3; } 
sidebar{ border-bottom: 1px solid #e7ecf3; } 

.via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards_container .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_display-flex .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_images {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 5rem;
    height: 2.7rem;
    position: relative;
}
.via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards_container .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_display-flex .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_images svg.vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-icon {
    width: 5rem;
    height: 5rem;
    position: relative;
    top: 0.1px;
    fill: #05A6DF;
    cursor: pointer;
    display: inline;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 62em) {
    .via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards_container .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_display-flex .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_images svg.vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-icon {
        top: -8px;
    }
}
.via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards_container .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_display-flex .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_images svg.vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-icon_credit {
    top: 1px;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 62em) {
    .via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards_container .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_display-flex .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_images svg.vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-icon_credit {
        top: -8px;
    }
}
.via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards_container .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_display-flex .vlc-slds-icon-payment-close {
    position: relative;
    float: right;
    cursor: pointer;
    top: 1.76rem;
    left: -2rem;
    width: 1.5rem;
    height: 1.5rem;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 62em) {
    .via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards_container .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_display-flex .vlc-slds-icon-payment-close {
        top: 1.38rem;
    }
}
.via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards_container .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_display-flex .vlc-slds-item--added {
    position: relative;
    top: -.75rem;
    left: 2.2rem;
    float: right;
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 62em) {
    .via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards_container .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_display-flex .vlc-slds-item--added {
        left: 2.1rem;
    }
}
@media only screen and (max-width: 62em) {
    .via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards_container .vlc-slds-edit-block--cards_display-flex .vlc-slds-item--added .slds-icon_container--circle {
        padding: .4rem;
    }
}

.via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards_container {
    cursor: pointer;
}

.via-slds .vlc-slds-edit-block--main-container .vlc-slds-edit-block--payments-cards {
    height: 80px;
    margin-bottom: 1.2rem;
}
</style>
OmniScript.description: Collect payment details from an existing customer.
